name: 麦克斯·阿伯蒂
name_full: 麦克斯·阿伯蒂 Max Alberti
introduction: Max Alberti, born August 13, 1982, in Munich, Bavaria, Germany, is a German actor and musician.Alberti started his career as a drummer for the band Jamaram, which he founded in 2000 along with bandmates Tom Lugo (vocals) and Samuel Hopf (guitar).Alberti's career as an actor began in 2003, when he landed a small role in the series, "Arabella." His reputation as a sexy actor quickly started to grow, such as in the 2008 TV series "Sie retten Dein Leben (You Save Your Life)" playing the role of emergency physician Dr. Tom Wagner and in "Lena - Liebe meines Lebens (Lena - Love of my Life)" as David von Arensberg, in which he appeared shirtless in almost every scene he was in.Alberti also acts in many television commercial ads for "Ferrero", "McDonald's" with the title 'Mediterannien', "Maggi" instant soups and "Knorr".
